contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish|Zygoi|Zygi Wilf}} {{Infobox settlement |coordinates_region=CY |subdivision_type=[[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_name={{flag|Cyprus}} |subdivision_type1=[[Districts of Cyprus|District]] |leader_title=[[Mayor]] |pushpin_map=Cyprus |timezone=[[Eastern European Time|EET]] |utc_offset=+2 |timezone_DST=[[Eastern European Summer Time|EEST]] |utc_offset_DST=+3 |postal_code_type=[[List of postal codes in Cyprus|Postal code]] |official_name = Zygi |native_name = Ζύγι |image_map = | |image_shield = | |img_coa_legend = | |shield_size = 200px| | subdivision_name1 = [[Larnaca District]] |population_total = |population_as_of = 2001<ref>[http://www.mof.gov.cy/mof/cystat/statistics.nsf/All/A5E0A9096615A568C2257122003FB72E/$file/POPULATION%20BY%20MUNICIPALITY_COMMUNITY-EN.xls?OpenElement ''Statistical Service of the Republic of Cyprus''] (MS Excel), 2001 Population Census</ref> |elevation_m = 0 |latd = 34 |latm = 44 |latNS = N |longd = 33 |longm = 20 |longEW = E |postal_code = | |leader_name = Michael Papademetriou| |website = http://www.zygi.com| }} '''Zygi''' ({{lang-el|Ζύγι}}, {{lang-tr|Terazi}} <ref>http://www.hurriyet.com.tr/planet/18239486.asp?gid=381</ref>) is a small village located in the south of [[Cyprus]] between [[Limassol]] and [[Larnaca]]. The coastline of the [[Mediterranean Sea]] lies to the south. Before 1974, substantial Cypriot-Turks lived here and they named it as "Terazi" ("Scales" in Turkish). The [[Evangelos Florakis Navy Base explosion]] of July 11, 2011 damaged every house in the village. {{coord|34|44|N|33|20|E|region:CY_type:city|display=title}} ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://gallery.cyprusexploring.com/zygi-photos-january Zygi photos in January 1d. 2011 year.] [[Category:Populated places in Larnaca District]] {{Cyprus-geo-stub}}
